name: Snowpocalypse (dbcodez)
description: Snowpocalypse is a 2D survival horror hack n slash. You're just a regular guy who's been shovelling snow all day long, you're tired and start to day dream..... nothing feels real anymore.... then it all changed... You find yourself in the same street but the sky is blood red and mutant zombies are out to get you.... can you survive? use your trusty shovel to wipe them out!
